protein.general_function: Involved in phosphatidylinositol phosphate kinase activity
protein.specific_function: Participates in the biosynthesis of phosphatidylinositol-4,5-bisphosphate

reference.reference_text: Castellino AM, Parker GJ, Boronenkov IV, Anderson RA, Chao MV: A novel interaction between the juxtamembrane region of the p55 tumor necrosis factor receptor and phosphatidylinositol-4-phosphate 5-kinase. J Biol Chem. 1997 Feb 28;272(9):5861-70.
